text: Bullet for My Valentine often known as BFMV are a heavy metal band from Wales. They have released two albums on the major record label Jive Records. These albums are entitled Scream Aim Fire and Fever, released in 2008 and 2010 respectively. they also have a self-titled EP and DVD's of performances live from the O3 Brixton School. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== * The Poison (2006) * Scream Aim Fire (2008) * Fever (2010) * Temper Temper (2013) * Venom (2015) * Gravity (2018) * Bullet for My Valentine (2021) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1990s music groups Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:Welsh musical groups Category:British heavy metal bands Category:Thrash metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 1998 Category:1998 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:1990s establishments in Wales
